effect.ruby_sapphire: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.emerald: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.firered_leafgreen: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.colosseum: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.xd: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
short_effect.emerald: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
short_effect.colosseum: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
short_effect.xd: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: If the user faints, the foe is also made to faint.
flavor_text.emerald: If the user faints, the foe is also made to faint.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: If the user faints, the foe delivering the final hit also faints.
